thread.title: Want To Boost Focus? Try These 5 Desk-Friendly Yoga Poses
thread.title_full: Want To Boost Focus? Try These 5 Desk-Friendly Yoga Poses

author: Leigh Weingus
title: Want To Boost Focus? Try These 5 Desk-Friendly Yoga Poses
text:
0 Photo: @omandthecity 
Your day was going well. You were full of energy and checking items off your work to-do list left and right. Then 4 p.m. hits, and you're hit with a wave of exhaustion. You realize that cookie you ate an hour ago led to a massive sugar crash. Your body is achy, you're having a hard time focusing, and you're suddenly in the grouchiest mood ever. 
Instead of reaching for a cup of coffee that will keep you up all night, consider this: There are some simple, subtle yoga poses that will fill you with energy, eliminate aches and pains, and put you in a great mood—and you can do all of them at your desk. Below, yogi Jules Hunt demonstrates five of them. ADVERTISEMENT Leigh Weingus 
Leigh is the Senior Yoga & Fitness Editor at MindBodyGreen. She's also a green smoothie-obsessed yogi and runner who also enjoys the occasional barre and bootcamp class. She loves to write, she'll read any book you hand to her, and she's willing to spend hours hunting down a ripe avocado.… Read more
